data.name: Activators for alcoholic and malolactic fermentation
data.value: Activadores para la fermentación alcohólica y maloláctica

data.name: Bottled by
data.comment: Indication of the bottler. Regulated by Article 46 of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A02019R0033-20231208#art_46

data.name: Bottled in a protective atmosphere
data.comment: Packaging gases Article 48a(6) of Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33 clearly states, ‘the indication of additives falling under the category “packaging gases” in the list of ingredients may be replaced by the specific particular “Bottled in a protective atmosphere” or “Bottling may happen in a protective atmosphere”’. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:02019R0033-20231208

data.name: Bottling may happen in a protective atmosphere
data.value: El embotellado puede realizarse en una atmósfera protectora
data.comment: Packaging gases Article 48a(6) of Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33 clearly states, ‘the indication of additives falling under the category “packaging gases” in the list of ingredients may be replaced by the specific particular “Bottled in a protective atmosphere” or “Bottling may happen in a protective atmosphere”’. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:02019R0033-20231208

data.value: No beba si es menor de edad legal para beber.

data.name: Don't drink when driving a car, motorbike or operating machinery
data.value: No beber mientras se conduce un coche, una motocicleta o se utiliza maquinaria.

data.name: Grapes
data.comment: RawMaterial Ingredients shall be designated by their specific name, with the exceptions provided for in the FIC Regulation and in Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33 (e.g. ‘grapes’ referring to the raw material). https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:02019R0033-20231208
Ingredients shall be designated by their specific name, with the exceptions provided for in the FIC Regulation and in Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33 (e.g. ‘grapes’ referring to the raw material).

data.name: Imported by
data.comment: Indication of the importer. Regulated by Article 46 of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A02019R0033-20231208#art_46

data.name: Ingredients
data.comment: Ingredients Table 2 of Part A of Annex I of Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/934 identifies the full list of additives and processing aids that can be used in wine production. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/search.html?scope=EURLEX&text=2019%2F934&lang=en&type=quick&qid=1701362513497

Table 2 of Part A of Annex I of Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/934 identifies the full list of additives and processing aids that can be used in wine productionhttps://eur-lex.europa.eu/search.html?scope=EURLEX&text=2019%2F934&lang=en&type=quick&qid=1701362513497

data.name: Nutrition Information
data.comment: Nutrition Information The presentation of the nutrition declaration is regulated in Article 34 of the FIC Regulation. The order of presentation of the different elements of the nutrition declaration is defined in Annex XV of the FIC Regulation. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A02011R1169-20180101&qid=1701362311604
The presentation of the nutrition declaration is regulated in Article 34 of the FIC Regulation.
The order of presentation of the different elements of the nutrition declaration is defined in Annex XV of the FIC Regulation.

data.name: Nutritions per
data.comment: Nutrition Information Energy values and nutrition values must be indicated per 100 g or per 100 ml (Article 32(2) of the FIC Regulation). https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A02011R1169-20180101&qid=1701362311604
Energy values and nutrition values must be indicated per 100 g or per 100 ml (Article 32(2) of the FIC Regulation).

data.name: Open-source solution for electronic labels
data.value: Solución de código abierto para etiquetas electrónicas

data.name: Packaged by
data.comment: In case of containers other than bottles, the words ‘packager’ and ‘packaged by (…)’ shall replace the words ‘bottler’ and ‘bottled by (…)’ respectively Regulated by Article 46 of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A02019R0033-20231208#art_46

data.name: Produced and Bottled by
data.comment: Indication of the producer and bottler (if they concern the same natural or legal person). Regulated by Article 46 of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A02019R0033-20231208#art_46

data.name: Produced by
data.comment: Indication of the producer. Regulated by Article 46 of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A02019R0033-20231208#art_46

data.name: Sold by
data.comment: Indication of the vendor (if not the producer). Regulated by Article 46 of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/33. https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A02019R0033-20231208#art_46

data.name: This label isn't available. Sorry about that.
data.value: Esta etiqueta no está disponible. Lo siento.

data.value: Pautas de accesibilidad al contenido web (WCAG) 2.2
